## First steps

    library(devtools)
    install_github("slidify", "ramnathv")
    install_github("slidifyLibraries", "ramnathv")

    library(slidify)
    author("slidify_example")

    # edit slidify_example/index.Rmd

    slidify("index.Rmd")

## A figure

```{r a_figure, echo=FALSE, fig.align="center"}
par(las=1)
n <- 100
x <- rnorm(n)
y <- 2*x + rnorm(n)
plot(x, y, pch=16, col="slateblue")
```
